description: These lightly seasoned cherries are a welcome addition to dishes.
keywords: Stir-fry,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Cherry,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Stir Fried Cherries Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium lemon, 2 tbs of juice and 1 tbs of zest

recipeInstructions.text: Add all ingredients to a wok or suitable pan and bring to a medium heat. Cook all ingredients while tossing regularly until the sugar and butter has melted fully.
Once sugar and butter has melted, toss and fry for a further minute before taking off the heat. Serve as a condiment to desserts or other dishes.
